storyInfo: Robin finds herself unconscious after a surprise assassination attempt, at the same time that Kafka, who is also present, makes contact with Anthony.

attributes.content: Hmph!
attributes.name: B-Zone Prisoner B

attributes.content: Euggh...
attributes.name: A-Zone Prisoner

attributes.content: (This prisoner's fierce! Knocked all the others down in just a few hits.)
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: ...Go to hell.
attributes.name: B-Zone Prisoner B

attributes.content: (This jailer's a mighty one too. She's just guarding, though, seems like. I wonder why...)
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Heagh!
attributes.name: B-Zone Prisoner B

attributes.content: (Crud, the jailer's down...)
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: (Just me left. But if I end up fighting with him here, it's gonna be a mess to explain after.)
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: And you.
attributes.name: B-Zone Prisoner B

attributes.content: (Think, c'mon. Is my only option to throw fists?)
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: You're fast.
attributes.name: B-Zone Prisoner B

attributes.content: (Anthony... rescued me?)
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: I might not know who you are, but you shouldn't be doing this. Not this, right in front of my eyes.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Heh heh, death's knocking and you still care about other folk. You're a real gentleman, Mr. Anthony.
attributes.name: B-Zone Prisoner A

attributes.content: (When did he—?!)
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Heheh. Here, miss. Don't be scared of me. Just blame it on your rotten luck.
attributes.name: B-Zone Prisoner A

attributes.content: Relax. Asides from Anthony, we don't wanna kill nobody. You just take a lie-down.
attributes.name: B-Zone Prisoner A

attributes.content: (Shit!)
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Guh...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: (He got me...)
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: (I can't—think clear...)
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: ...let's...you a warm welcome...Anthony...
attributes.name: B-Zone Prisoner A

attributes.content: ...dead...
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I didn't expect you to be this good of a cook. Wow.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Hm-hmm! Betcha didn't.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Anyway, she got caught up in another assassin's attempt and lost consciousness, then...?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: That must've sucked.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Yeah, unlucky her.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: So how'd this assassination pan out?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: We know Anthony must've won, but this was an attempt on his life in a prison. Couldn't have gone without comment.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Yup. But because Robin was out during that time, we have to go from Kafka's side.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Ooh, but didn't Kafka get knocked out by that convict too?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Oh, she sandbagged that one. So she says.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Ah... okay, that adds up. It does seem like her style, yep.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Talk. Whose people sent you?
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Heh... heh... you wouldn't... know.
attributes.name: B-Zone Prisoner A

attributes.content: ...He's out.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: These people really were...
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: ...Fine. Thinking about it now won't do anything. Let's see how these prisoners are first.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Looks like none of them crossed the river.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: And then this girl...
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I don't know who you are, but you helped me back there...
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Thank you, girl stranger.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: You can call me Kafka.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Hm? You're not out?
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Uh. Don't move. Just shift a bit to the right. Block the monitors.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Is this okay?
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Golden. Surveillance shouldn't see me now.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Lucky for me, I checked around while I was cleaning the rooms.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Who are you?
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I told you, call me Kafka. I'm here to help you.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: But this is a real snafu. I was gonna leave you a slip of paper and call it there. Didn't expect those guys to suddenly go off.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: What in the world is happening?
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Not the right place to talk about that. Know anywhere good?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: ...The jailers should be coming over to see what the ruckus was. We can go to the clinic. That'll work.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: What in blue blazes?! Anthony, what the hell are you doing?!
attributes.name: Barton

attributes.content: That's what I'd like to ask, Barton.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: These prisoners snuck in with the intent to kill me.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: What the hell are you doing?
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Barton

attributes.content: It's the truth, Superintendent Barton. I witnessed Mr. Anthony fight off two inmates.
attributes.name: Jailer B

attributes.content: What? Weren't you watching them?!
attributes.name: Barton

attributes.content: The two of them knocked me out. They were quite... no, very strong.
attributes.name: Jailer B

attributes.content: Rgh. Good for nothing.
attributes.name: Barton

attributes.content: How do you want me to explain all this to the Warden?!
attributes.name: Barton

attributes.content: Let's get a grip on the present first, Barton.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: These two are the assassins. You can deal with them.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: A—hem. Right, but Mr. Anthony, you see, we can't just take you at your word for all of this...
attributes.name: Barton

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I've suffered minor injuries. I need a trip to the clinic first. They knocked everyone else unconscious. It might behoove you to send them all to the clinic too.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Once we're there, I will explain things in fine detail.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Alright, alright.
attributes.name: Barton

attributes.content: What are you bunch navel-gazing for? Throw these two bodies in the morgue, and drag all of THEM with you!
attributes.name: Barton

attributes.content: Y-Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Jailer

attributes.content: Sir!
attributes.name: Jailer

attributes.content: The jailers're all gone, Anthony.
attributes.name: Domma

attributes.content: What happened? I saw them all looking perturbed some.
attributes.name: Domma

attributes.content: I'd like to know too.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Alright. This place is safe, young Kafka.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Domma is my friend. If I could call anyone in this prison trustworthy, it'd be her.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: First off, drop that 'young.' I'm just some random li'l shortie.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Apologies, Miss Kafka.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Man, okay, you. For a prisoner, you're politer than all the people outside.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: This's how Anthony is. He don't hold back courtesy for anyone.
attributes.name: Domma

attributes.content: Yeah, I get it. You look like a haymaker, but you've got manners for days too. Not surprising everyone else in here thinks you're a juggernaut.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: You flatter me.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Well, then. My turn to ask the questions. You're apparently here to aid me. That means you know where my assassins came from, I suppose?
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Uhh... before that, I need to ask you something first.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Please do.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: You know what your family—or I guess your dad is the one Simon Co.'s named after—anyway, do you know exactly what happened there?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: As long as you do, I can explain things a lot simpler.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: My father was detained on more than ten charges. I know the circumstances couldn't have been simple, but I've had no time to find out concretely.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Okay, you know, yeah. That's good enough for me. Um, Simon Co., uh... thanks to ille... il... whawazzit?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Do you mean, 'illicit?'
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Yeah, that! Illicit, smuggling, of Originium, goods! Anyway, the company got shut down, and the core members all went to prison.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: So your whole family's serving in Bunkerhill City right now.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.text: Anthony slams a fist onto the nearby table. Everything on top of it rattles off.

attributes.content: Anthony...
attributes.name: Domma

attributes.content: ...I'm alright.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I prepared myself to hear this a long time ago.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I'm already happier than you could believe, knowing they're not dead.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Alright. Who sent them?
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: HydeBro.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: HydeBro. So it was you.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Lemme just think. What did Silence say... Right, your family. The Simons. Were competing with them across some kind of line.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: You were camping 50% of the profits each over this. And there was plenty of friction. So they always wanted to just camp your share too.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: And then they did it. Pretty simple.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: ...HydeBro.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I heard my father mention that name often. I even visited their company as a guest once.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: They did all of this over a bit of selfishness...
attributes.name: Domma

attributes.content: I'd heard of similar events before. I just never expected it'd happen around me.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Anthony. Are you alright? Need me to use my Arts, settle your mind some?
attributes.name: Domma

attributes.content: No, thank you, Domma.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I told you, I prepared myself for this long ago. I didn't expect the reality to come so sudden, that's all.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I believe you, Miss Kafka. I think there's no reason you'd have to deceive me about this.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Seeing how things are, those assassins ought to be from HydeBro. Why only come at this point?
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: That, I have no idea at all. But judging by my experience, that wasn't the last of them just now.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: They've sent a whole bunch of people in to take you out for sure, so, uh, we should probably call this the very beginning.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: How about you? I presume you're not here just to help fend these killers off for me, are you? What's your objective, Miss Kafka?
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Me? Mmm... it's kinda tough to explain fast, but let's say this: someone trusts me to help you break outta here.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: You do wanna get out and take revenge, right?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: You got a life sentence. And it's the kind without parole.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: If you wanna leave this place, then you've got one choice, and that's—jailbreak.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: And that's why I'm here to help.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Obviously, if you don't wanna peace out and you're gonna stay here forever, it's not like I'm gonna force you to go.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Jailbreak... but no soul has ever made a clean escape from this prison.
attributes.name: Domma

attributes.content: Eyy. Say that if you want. But you can't knock it till you try it, right?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: ...You've been in this prison for a good while now, Miss Kafka.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Hm? Yeah, sure have.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Then you should have heard some things about me.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Yup. They all say you're the most powerful prisoner, and the most free. Pretty much everyone thinks you're strong as heck.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: I think you're pretty strong too, right now. Staying calm in times like these.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: But fact is, that's not what's happening.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Even with all this supposed 'charisma' I have, as a prisoner, I can't bend the jailers, let alone the warden. I should never have earned my current standing.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Eh, that's true enough. But you earned it now, so hey.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: In reality, what I've earned is the turnkeys' favor.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: At least, what little I know is that the warden himself said it. He told them to be 'slightly nicer' with me.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: All these years, I've had suspicions. After I reached Ironforge City, I was arrested. Then I came to this prison. Did my father arrange for this from the start?
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Foreseeing something, and sending me here in advance.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Such things have always spun in my mind.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Oh, Silence mentioned that too. She said it was just one possibility, though.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Silence. Is that the name of your backer?
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Uh... whelp, whatever. Yeah, it is.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: I'll be sure to thank this friend afterwards.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Anyway, it's just one possibility as you say. If I want to know the reason for sure, I'll need to get out. This is something only I can shine a light on.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Anthony, is it really alright to tell her this?
attributes.name: Domma

attributes.content: It's fine. I believe you for the moment, Miss Kafka. Thus, I'm willing to level with you.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Even if you didn't show up—even if I'd long since gotten used to life in this prison—I've still yearned, incessantly, to leave here.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I can obtain most of what I want in here. But not since the beginning have I found the faintest outline of how to get out.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: So in truth, I should be the one asking you, Miss Kafka.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Please, help me break out.
attributes.name: Anthony
